name: In Front of Heaven's Gates
description:
Welcome to In Front Of Heaven's Gates !

A game made entirely by me, Rares_Dev also known as rev, in less than a week. That's right, even though the Game-Jam has been going for around 2 weeks, I decided to give myself a harder challenge, that being working faster and harder. I know the game is pretty simple and basic but it took me more time to make the sprites other than the coding itself, heh.

FORGOT TO ADD A TUTORIAL SO HERE'S THE BASICS :

You will be given a list of 3 lines. There's a 50/50 chance between good and evil.

If there are 2 or more "Has been good" on the list, the person should be sent to heaven.

If there are 2 or more "Has been bad" on the list, the person should be sent to hell.I really like how the project turned out and I plan to release it for android, maybe add a shop and some other stuff.
